Summary: Bright light hovering over the Half Moon Bay Mountains changes into a huge craft with orbs
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting in my kitchen @ 11:30 pm i saw a bright light hovering over the Half Moon Bay Mountains for about 30 minutes just sitting there then As i wathced i noticed it was comming closer so i pulled out my camera and started to tape it.I zoomed in on it and tell me what you think a large retangle shaped vessel with orbs floating through, it looks like small space ships. Then it piulled back and changed shape and started traveling SE till out of sight.
